titles.title: Welcoming the expression of support of 18 European nations for the enforcement of United Nations Security Counsel Resolution 1441.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

bill.summary: 2/13/2003--Introduced. Welcomes the expression of support from Albania, Bulgaria, Croatia, the Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Hungary, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Macedonia, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, and the United Kingdom for Iraq's full compliance with Security Council Resolution 1441, and of their solidarity with the United States in calling for the demands of the Security Council to be met with regard to Iraq's full disarmament.
